title: Black Bear
lyrics:
With this body, he is God and I am nothing
He has come for the blood of my only son
I can sense his heart beat slowly fade
The sound of my voice is his way to me
I buried my tongue with my families bones



As they lay me down to sleep

I pray to the Lord to put me six feet deep

Put me six feet deep!



Father forgive me for I have sinned

I know that we will all meet our fate

Even the beast of the underworld

Burns eternally within his own flame

Save my son, feel my embrace

Sleep my son

Feel my embrace

Please donâ€™t forget my love

As the bullet goes through his brain

I wake up to live it again and again



As they hang me down to sleep

I pray to the Lord to put me six feet deep

Put me six feet deep!

Pray to the Lord to put me six feet deep!
